Booking well in advance might increase the odds of getting your money back if needed.
4. Reason behind wanting to cancel/request a refund - If the reason for needing a refund is due to unforeseen circumstances such as illness or family emergencies, most airlines have procedures in place to accommodate these situations. Provided that you qualify for an exemption under their guidelines, you stand a better chance of obtaining a refund.
